help-file.title: "STORNOGS SHIMMERING STARSHELL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: room Aggressive: no Duration: 5 hours Type of spell: Conjuration
Creates a shell of energy that focuses the sun (or stars) energy to create a screen of interference, preventing some magical activity. Due to the dependence on stars, the spell may only be cast outside, and on the prime material plane.
